Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Alif Lam Ra. Tsino ni tsinyali tsieshitabu nende Ikurani yinoosinjia
Awundi balitsa bekomba balia bakhaya mbu bamanyanga baba Abasalamu
Baleshesa balie ebiakhulia mana basangale, mana bakatibwe nende liparo lwobubeyi (mbu balileshelwa), ahambi ano betsa okhumanya
Ne shikhwasishiakhwo olukongo lwosi lwosi tawe halali lwali nende ebise bialwo bimanyikhane
Ne babulaho Abandu bosi bosi banyala okhwuranjilila ebise bieyindukho biabu, nohomba shibanyala okhushindibwa tawe
Nebaboola mbu; “ Ewe ulia oweshilibwakhwo amestulisio, toto ewe oli omulalu”
“Shichila shina nolakhurerera Abamalaika nikali mbu ewe oli mubaboolanga obwatoto?’’
Efwe shikhwishinjia Abamalaika halali khubwatoto (ebise biokhusishibwa khwabu nibiula), ne awo shibalihebwa obwiyangu tawe (balisishibwa butswa)
Toto efwe khweshia ametsulisio kano, ne khandi toto efwe nefwe khwitsa okhukalinda
Ne toto khwaruma Abarumwa mumikanda chia Abandu beyimbeli
Ne Omurumwa yesiyesi shiyabetselanga halali bo bamukholelanga omubayo
Ne endio nilwakhwinjisinjia mumioyo chia balia abamabii
Shibasuubilanga kano tawe, ne bamala okhulola shingala kali khubandu bali imbeli wabu eyo
Ne khubafungulilanga omuliango kwo mwikulu mana baba nibaninanga
Kho bakhaboolele mbu; “tsimoni tsiefu tsimeesibwe ne efwe abeene khulochelwe.”
Ne toto khwara mwikulu tsing’ining’ini, mana nikhutsirona khubalia bokhuhenga
Ne khwatsilinda okhurulana nende buli Shetani ulondungwa
Halali ulia uwulilisinjia mukhwiba, naye mana, amulondangakhwo nende eshichenga shiomulilo shilolokha
Ne liloba khwaliala mana nikhuramwo tsingulu ne nikhumesiamwo buli eshindu khushichelo
Ne nikhubakasiliamwo obulamu, nende ebindi bia enywe mulabikabilanga tawe
Ne shibulaho shiosi shiosi halali shirula khwifwe, nesikhushiishinjia tawe halali khushichelo shimanyishe
Ne khureranga omuyeka kwitsulemwo liime, ne khwishinjia amatsi okhurula mumaleesi ako. Mana khubanywesinjia amatsi ako. Ne shimuli enywe mukabikhanga tawe
Ne ni efwe khulamusinjia ne ninefwe abafwisinjia, na ni efwe nefwe abalichelama. (abalikalusia)
Ne khwamanya abaranjililanga mwinywe, nekhumanyile abatong’a inyuma
Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo niye wakhabakhung’asie toto Ye niye Owamachesi Omumanyi muno
Ne toto khwalonga Omundu okhurula khwiloba eliumu, elirusinjia- omwoyo- isauti(nilituywa) elirulana nende amatoyi karebwakhwo ifwani
Ne Amajiini khwakalonga imbeli awo, okhurulana nende omuyeka kwo mulilo
Ne Nyasaye wuwo olwayaboolela Malaika mbu; “Toto esie nditsa okhulonga Omundu okhurula khuliloba liwumukhanga, lirulana nende amatoyi akarebwamwo ifwani
Kho olwa ndalamala okhumulonga mana nemufuramwo emiuya chianje, mumwinamile khulwa okhumuwa eshiribwa
Abamalaika boosi halala nibamwinamila
Halali Ibilisi, yakhaya okhuba halala nende balia benama
(Nyasaye)Naboola mbu; “Ewe Ibilisi obele orie olabeele halala nende abenaame?”
Naboola; “Shenyala okhwinamila Omundu wawaloonga khuliloba eliumu lirusinjia -omwoyo- isauti, elirula khu matoyi karebwakhwo ifwani tawe.”
(Nyasaye) Naboola mbu; “ rula omo, oli omutsube’’
Ne toto oli nende eshilamo shianje okhula inyanga yeyindukho.”
Naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wanje Omulesi! Mbelesie obwiyangu okhula inyanga yabalilamusibwa”
(Nyasaye) Naboola mbu; “toto ewe olimubalia bahebwa obwiyangu
Okhula inyanga yebise bimanyishe biarebwaho .”
Naboola;“Nyasayewanje!shingalawambusilia okhukora nditsa okhubaronela(abandu) khushialo ne nditsa okhubakosia boosi.”
Halali Abasumba bobo abatswenufu”
(Nyasaye) naboola mbu “ino ni injila yokhwitsa ewanje ingololofu”
“Ne toto Abandu banje ewe sholaba nende obunyali khubo tawe, halali balia abakori bakhulondakhwo
Ne toto Jahannam niho habundu wabu, wabakasilibwa bosi
Ili nende emiliango saba, nebuli omuliango kuli nende ebuleka yakabulwa
Toto balia baria Nyasaye baliba mumikunda nende tsisebele
“Injilemwo mushironyo nomulembe”
Ne khulirusia amakhonye akali mubilifu biabu, ne baliba (shinga) Abananda nibekhale khubisala biobwami nibahengana
Shibulibatilakhwo obuchong’e bwosi bwosi omo tawe, ne shibalirusibwamwo tawe
Boolela Abasumba banje mbu esie nesie Owobulesheli obunji Owetsimbabaasi muno
